feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Hosted Private Cloud] - Upgrade Veeam backupProxy OS
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 17, 08:00 UTC  -  Feb 21, 16:00 UTC

Jan 30, 23:56 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 17/02/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 21/02/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will perform an operation to upgrade Veeam backupProxy OS.
Please note that you can reschedule this migration by your own.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX2A][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 17, 08:00 UTC  -  Feb 21, 16:00 UTC

Jan 29, 02:31 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 17/02/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 21/02/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Rack R831B26
entry.content:
Jan 30, 13:36 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on Rack R831B26 has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 30/01/2025 09:15 UTC
End time : 30/01/2025 09:25 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 30, 10:46 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an incident affecting our Hosted Private Cloud offering, which is causing temporary availability issues in the rack R831B26.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 30/01/2025 09:15 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some servers are unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some hosts in RBX2 region were automatically transferred to backups.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

Our teams are fully engaged and working to resolve the issue as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 30, 09:53 UTC
Investigating - We are currently experiencing an event affecting our Hosted Private Cloud offer in the rack R831B26.
Start time : 30/01/2025 09:15 UTC

Our teams are fully committed to investigating this issue and working towards a resolution as soon as possible. As investigations are ongoing, we will share any new findings or updates with you as soon as possible.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

entry.title: [Global][Hosted Private Cloud] - Vsphere management incident notification
entry.content:

Here is detail for this incident :

End time : 15/01/2025 15:21 UTC

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 15, 15:16 UTC
Identified - We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our hosted private cloud on managed vSphere offer.

Here are some supplementary details :
Start time : 14/01/2025 09:34 UTC
Impacted Services : The vSphere management access is currently unreachable on hosted private cloud with IAM enabled
Customers Impact : Customers with IAM enabled may encounter management access issues on vSphere management.
No impact on customers workload.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a software issue.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are working diligently to resolve the issue as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
